Latest Work

I have experience in a number of different areas. Have a look at what I'm working on right now.

Givvit

Givvit is a tech startup based in London which allows anyone to send small treats (such as coffee or flowers) to friends. Currently launching Givvit for Business, which allows companies to send treats to their employees and customers. I am the tech ninja on the team :)

React Angular Node Sass Bootstrap

Dingo

Dingo is a London based startup that has developed an interesting Fan2Fan ticketing app to safely buy and sell tickets to live events. I developed the Backend with Ruby on Rails, developed the Android App with Angular,Ionic and Phonegap, and leaded the iOS team.

Angular Node Rails Sass

Supporter

Supporter.com is a Sports Betting Service Aggregator based in Sweden. I designed the APIs on the backend and built the mobile app for Android and iOS.

Backbone Phonegap Node Sass Bootstrap

Q&A Properties

The place for the most complete questions and the most relevant answers when renting, buying, selling or looking to invest in properties in the UK. I built the mobile app and launched it on Google Play and the App Store.

Angular Ionic Phonegap Node Sass

Tocarta

I founded Tocarta in 2011, a startup based in Madrid that created the first tablet-based digital menus for restaurants in Europe. Also hired and managed the development teams.

Javascript HTML CSS Phonegap Rails
